item.description:
You've dealt with one too many online dating time waster, paid out the wazoo for memberships and had too many first  encounters that left you deflated. Time to sharpen your instincts and strengthen the tools you already have to make online dating work for you.

Learn how to decipher someone's profile and figure out their intentions, figure out what buzz words you might be using in your profile that give people the wrong impression. Most importantly, get tips on how to go from a couple emails to a first meet up without any angst or confusion.

This class is about getting you the right attitude required to date online successfully!!

  • Be sure to register with your valid email and cell phone number. The day of the class you will receive the call in number and PIN code to access this teleclass. You will receive this notification via email AND text.
  • Please email us a link to your online dating profile at least 24 hours before the class – email link to [masked]
  • Only 7 spots available for this teleclass.
  • Must call in to the teleclass no later than 10 minutes before the advertised start time.
  • Class will last 75-90 minutes

$20 - REGISTER HERE: http://andthatswhyyouresingle.com/online-dating-teleclass-with-profile-review/

Admission Includes 10 page Online Dating Profile Writing Guide.

Find out what people REALLY think when they read your online dating profile. Open to all ages!

WHAT YOU’LL LEARN
*Ways to write your intentions clearly and attract the right people.
*More original ways to help you sound like the fun, smart, attractive person you are.
*Techniques to use to stand out and get noticed
*Red flags to look out for so you can avoid frustration and disappointment.
*Keys to picking appropriate usernames.
*What NOT to include in your profile.
*Ways to read between the lines of other profiles so you know who to avoid.
*Photo selection & Review.

 

$20 - REGISTER HERE: http://andthatswhyyouresingle.com/online-dating-teleclass-with-profile-review/

Mariann
“ i really enjoyed this workshop as it was definitely insightful. i was ready for the constructive criticism to get my dating profile up to par. chris had great advice and a gave us all a handbook on how to perfect our profile. looking forward to improving mine and getting more hits from quality men! ”

Shannon
“ I found the meetup very informative. I liked the hand-out, and I enjoyed getting to know new people. ”

“ This was a very worthwhile event, it was very interactive, everyone felt at ease and the discussion was very animated. I think the best part was the ability to have the current profile critiqued. I even learned from the critique of other people’s profiles, not just my own. Well done! ” – Jyothi

“Hey Chris-Just wanted to let you know that maybe it’s a coincidence but
I feel like I’m already getting more responses to my profile
since I changed some things you told me to change Thanks for all your advice! – DeDe”

group.name: The Boston Social/Singles Networking Meetup Group

item.name: Online Dating Profile Writing, Review & Advice Teleclass
